Line5.101CF8: If you find any other parts of this, bring them to me at once. I will ask others to scour the countryside for the pieces as well. We can't risk the pieces of this falling into the wrong hands.
Line1.101CF8: It's good that you brought this to me. It's hard to make out the animal's form from the bit that's here...but I see the clawed limbs of a large, predatory beast.
